US says it takes seriously reports of misbehavior by its envoy to SingaporeThe White House on Friday said the U.S. government was taking seriously an internal watchdog report that the U.S. ambassador to Singapore threatened his staff and failed to submit about $48,000 in travel expenses on time or with proper documentation. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 03:03:22 GMT 6JUZQG5265OKFE5Z5KL23L2UVU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-says-it-takes-seriously-reports-of-misconduct-by-its-envoy-singapore-2024-03-02/Reuters世界
Japanese ex-soldier wins U.S. award for her fight against sexual harassmentThe United States on Friday said it would honour former Japan Self-Defense Forces soldier Rina Gonoi with the International Women of Courage Award for bringing about change in the Japanese military with her victory in a sexual harassment case. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 02:18:16 GMT 4BRLJCA3MBLHLJ3I4HRK2QTSVY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japanese-ex-soldier-wins-us-award-for-her-fight-against- Sex-harassment-2024-03-02/Akiko Okamoto世界亚太地区
Argentina's Milei pledges to 'speed up' plans in fiery challenge to CongressArgentine President Javier Milei vowed to "speed up" his plans to overhaul the country and solve its economic woes in a fiery speech to Congress on Friday, challenging them to pass a new package of bills after an earlier version of his "omnibus" reform was rebuffed last month. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 01:06:17 GMT TFAX4XVZEBLKREPRIIZ6ZHRNHI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentina-miles-send-new-reform-b​​ills-to-congress-2024-03-02/Kylie Madry, Maximilian Heath世界美洲
South Korea publicly orders some doctors who walked off the job back to workSouth Korea's government late on Friday publicly ordered 13 doctors, at least some of whom have been vocal about a walkout by roughly 9,000 physicians over a health system reform plan, to return to work or face penalties. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 00:43:52 GMT QJDB7JUZANICVE72GKVMDBBREU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-publicly-orders-some-doctors-who-walked-off-job-back-work-2024-03-02/Reuters商业工作世界
Australia PM defends action on cost of living amid by-electionVoters went to the polls on Saturday in a by-election in Australia's Victoria state seen as a referendum on Prime Minister Anthony Albanese's handling of cost of living pressures across the country. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 00:23:09 GMT 6DB6IBEYCNM2JMNXU257YFJTGY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-pm-defends-action-cost-living-amid-by-election-2024-03-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Biden hopes for Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal by RamadanU.S. President Joe Biden on Friday said he hoped there would be a ceasefire deal between Israel and militant group Hamas by the time of the Muslim fasting month of Ramadan, which starts on March 10. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 23:14:50 GMT FQVCIQQNPVMDRM65TQ452V3OB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/biden-hopes-israel-hamas-ceasefire-deal-by-ramadan-2024-03-01/Reuters世界中东地区
Explainer: How will the United States airdrop aid to Gaza?The U.S. military will start carrying out airdrops of food and supplies into Gaza in the coming days, joining other countries like France, Jordan and Egypt that have done the same. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 22:53:21 GMT HEOMDSSU3RO6VBP7QFUJXZA5J4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/how-will-the-united-states-airdrop-aid-to-gaza-2024-03-01/Reuters世界中东地区
Colombia's ELN rebels say have freed all hostages under deal with gov'tColombia's National Liberation Army (ELN) rebels said on Friday they have freed all hostages under a deal made with the country's government to end kidnapping for ransom. Global media outlets sign letter urging protection of journalists in GazaSenior leaders at multiple global media outlets signed a letter urging Israeli authorities to protect journalists in Gaza, saying reporters have been working in unprecedented conditions during Israel's assault on the enclave and faced "grave personal risk." Fri, 01 Mar 2024 21:06:27 GMT阿XUAERSWRN6FIBYFOE7S7R4RY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/global-media-outlets-sign-letter-urging-protection-of-journalists-in-gaza-2024-03-01/Kanishka Singh世界中东地区
Haitian gang leader vows to 'fight' prime minister, violence surgesHaitian gang leader Jimmy Cherizier, also known as Barbecue, warned on Friday he would keep trying to oust Prime Minister Ariel Henry, and asked families to keep children from going to school to "avoid collateral damages" as violence surges in parts of the capital. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 20:07:11 GMT EFEZR24N5BMCZK4XOHL5V3GL4E https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/us-embassy-haiti-issues-alert-amid-heavy-gunfire-traffic-disruptions-2024-03-01/Reuters世界美洲
Injured survivors of Gaza aid chaos say Israeli forces shot at themSome Palestinians injured in a Gaza aid delivery disaster said on Friday that Israeli forces shot them as they rushed to get food for their families, describing a scene of terror and chaos.
